text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Will he fix the corruption of #lymeDisease? Millions undiagnosed & at risk for #coronavirus now- as #CDC pushed #NoTestBadTest for 45 years!  Lyme destroys your immune system - deficient & reacts badly. Many dont get sick with #Lyme symptoms until a serious illness. Disables 1/2.
